function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the contents of a file or list a directory. Supports glob patterns: *.ext matches in a single directory; **/*.ext matches recursively. Example paths: src/*.mjs, src/**/*.test.mjs. When listing, returns ls -l style lines with permissions, owner, group, size, and name. When reading a file, returns a header with permissions/owner/group then the file content (possibly truncated).

path.description: The path to the folder or file to read

max_length.description: Maximum number of bytes to read; defaults to 10000 if not specified
